name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and garlic.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Golden-fried sticks of mozzarella cheese served with marinara sauce.

name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy dip made with spinach, artichokes, and melted cheese, served with tortilla chips.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce (Buffalo, BBQ, or Teriyaki).

name: Caprese Skewers
description: Skewers of fresh mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Fried Calamari
description: Tender rings of calamari lightly breaded and fried, served with marinara sauce.

name: Shrimp Cocktail
description: Chilled shrimp served with tangy cocktail sauce.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Mushroom caps filled with a savory mixture of cheese, breadcrumbs, and herbs.

name: Cheese Quesadilla
description: Grilled tortilla filled with melted cheese, served with salsa and sour cream.

name: Potato Skins
description: Crispy potato skins loaded with cheese, bacon, and green onions, served with sour cream.
